TopicTitle: Issue with EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements - cannot see Biomes

Articles.Content:
I am using EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements 1.8.0, Kerbin just has to have clouds and so should Eve.

But I have found that with the EVE mod installed I cannot see the Biomes cheat or resource mapping on the planet Eve. I can see them on Kerbin but I assume that is because Kerbin's atmosphere is less dense than on Eve.

Any suggestion on running the EVE Mod and still being able to to the Biomes and resources?

 

Thanks

Bruce

You might have more success if you ask this in the mod support thread, as this forum is more for questions on how to play the stock game.

Bu as far as I see it, you have three options:

1.) edit the config for Eve so it is less opaque
2.) install the ScanSat mod and make dedicated biome and resource maps
3.) use the stock KerbNet functionality to view which biome you're currently flying over
Your question has been moved to the modded support sub, and good luck with your issue.
